snippet: Hafiz Saeed, a Pakistani militant leader accused of orchestrating the 2008 Mumbai attacks, told Al Jazeera on Tuesday that a new United States bounty on his head was strange since he was "not hiding in caves."
abstract: Hafiz Saeed, a Pakistani militant leader accused of orchestrating the 2008 Mumbai attacks, told Al Jazeera on Tuesday that a new United States bounty on his head was strange since he was "not hiding in caves."

headline.main: Pakistani Scoffs at New U.S. Bounty on Him
